sources.name: rawDataCsv
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  rawDataCsv

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared rawDataCsv = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://ssattirajudemorgstg.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/archive.zip/PS_20174392719_1491204439457_log.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  #"Promoted headers" = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  #"Promoted headers";
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = rawDataCsv,
  #"Removed other columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"step", "type", "amount", "nameOrig"})
in
  #"Removed other columns";
